description: Returns the policy of a specified bucket.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: If an adversary can access a bucket policy, it may provide insights into valid accounts or roles that can be exploited for further access.
By analyzing the bucket policy, an attacker can discover accounts or IAM roles that have access to the S3 bucket, which may help in escalating privileges within the environment.
